page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: A teenager in the 80's Is quite a happy life All though there isn't many jobs My life is full of spice There's many shops Where I live But the kids are alright. On Saturday nights We go out dancing To a disco with flashing lights We dance all eveing and all night It fills us with delight In the morning,it starts again My ordinary day. Up in the morning,go out shopping To get something new Then go home Watch some telly Then watch and watch some more Perhaps one day I'll get a job Until then I'll have to wait some more
